thread.title: Open Monahan's State Park For OHV Family Use
thread.title_full: Open Monahan's State Park For OHV Family Use

title: Open Monahan's State Park For OHV Family Use
text:
by: Jarrett W target: Texas Parks and Wildlife, Texas 
Monahan's Sandhills State Park has long been a treasure in the West Texas community, though the park is not living up to its full potential. On average, the park costs tax payers around $100,000 to operate annually.Off road vehicles are currently not permitted access, and the surrounding community's are not benefiting from the potential economic surplus. With your help, we can change the park into an off road family attraction that will bring people in from all over for generations to come. Please sign the petition to help us on our quest!
